response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $12,000 for this remarkable product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this innovative solution to your doorstep soon.", "product_price": 12000}
